line_text: Precious, celestial? Wherefore speaks he this

line_text: O excellent!
scene_title: SCENE II.  Another part of the wood.

line_text: Sweet love,--

scene_title: SCENE II.  Another part of the wood.

line_text: And so far blameless proves my enterprise,

line_text: That I have 'nointed an Athenian's eyes;

line_text: And so far am I glad it so did sort

line_text: With drooping fog as black as Acheron,
